item.description:
So I'm making this event official! Buy your tickets by tomorrow evening on buywithme.com!!! I hope you see you there!!

Here's a direct link to the deal page: http://www.buywithme.... Make sure you get a ticket for the game on the 7th - that's when we'll be there.

After you make the purchase you'll be emailed a link to a voucher for download. We bring these to will-call to pick up our tickets and free t-shirt. This way we can meet ahead of time and organize sitting together!
________________________________________________________________________________

Hi,
Would anyone be interested in going to the New England Revolution game versus DC United on August 7th? There is a special on buywithme.com for a ticket and a tshirt for $20... or I could look into group tickets which can be priced either at $21.00 or $30.00 depending on where we want to sit.

The special on buywithme.com is only available for 4 more days and I think the downside might be we might not sit together.

Let me know if this is something we all want to do! And if this is a good date for you and your significant other!
item.how_to_find_us: Get there by 6:30! Call Stacy's cell to find the group: 720-233-6969
item.name: New England Revolution Game
